title: Rocket.Chat Rocketlet
description: A Rocketlet declaration for usage inside of Rocket.Chat.

id.description: The Rocketlet's unique identifier in uuid v4 format. This is optional, although recommended, however if you are going to publish on the Rocketlet store, you will be assigned one.

name.description: The public visible name of this Rocketlet.

nameSlug.description: A url friendly slugged version of your Rocketlet's name.

version.description: The version of this Rocketlet which will be used for display publicly and letting users know there is an update. This uses the semver format.

description.description: A description of this Rocketlet, used to explain what this Rocketlet does and provides for the user.

requiredApiVersion.description: The required version of the Rocketlet's API which this Rocketlet depends on. This uses the semver format.

name.description: The author's name who created this Rocketlet.

support.description: The place where people can get support for this Rocketlet, whether email or website.

homepage.description: The homepage for this Rocketlet, it can be a Github or the author's website.

classFile.description: The name of the file which contains your Rocketlet TypeScript source code.

iconFile.description: The name of the file to use as the icon.

assetsFolder.description: The name of the folder which contains all of your resources, it should not start with a period.
